net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.base

Class ClassificationReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.base.ClassificationReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithmListener, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RuleBaseReporter

    public abstract class ClassificationReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithmListener, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure
    Listener for classification algorithms.

    Reports the status of the population of the algorithm along generations in console or text file. Main methods: The doIterationReport() method reports the population status given a report frequency. The doDataReport() method classifies the train/test datasets and shows the classification errors for each data instance. The doClassificationReport() method is abstract to be implemented by each classifier type, e.g. to show the rule-base.

    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura, Jose M. Luna, Alberto Cano, Juan Luis Olmo
    See Also:
